title: HOLY SHIT! HOW DO I STOP NEW CLIENT DOWNLOAD?!
body:
I feel like I'm watching someone catch a slow case of herpes!

PLEASE SOMEONE STOP THIS DOWNLOAD!

replies.body:
yeah thanks!

It's fine now and I'm able to switch between new and old.

I restarted my computer and the DL was MUCH faster.

like 700kbs faster.
Have you finished the update completely with no issues?
I dont know my fucking client failed and now is at 1 percent fuck....
ALRIGHT I DUNNO WHAT HAPPENED, BUT IT FAILED AT LIKE 5% AND MADE ME REDO IT SO I CLOSED IT AND REOPENED IT AS AN ADMIN AND NOW IM AT 1200 KB/S
Commenting here so I know if you get a damn reply. This is ridiculous...
